strings: <voice_0x01000F31><se_high>Jessica: Don't you think we should tell Charmless that it's about time we got back to the castle?
<voice_0x01000F32><se_low>Yangus: If that Charmless geezer don't call it a day soon, we're never gonna get the magic mirror...
<voice_0x01000F33><se_low>Yangus: I reckon we should take 'im aside and tell it to 'im straight<:> ‘TIME TO GO, CHARMLESS!’
<voice_0x01000F34><se_def>Angelo: This is slowing us down too much. We need to persuade Charmless to go back to the castle so that we can get the magic mirror from Clavius.

<voice_0x01000F35><se_def>Angelo: If we don't hurry, Dhoulmagus might leave
the Dark Ruins and then we'll be back to
square one.
<voice_0x01000F36><se_high>Jessica: Do you really think Charmless is going to try and pass off that Argon heart he bought as one he won in battle? We should go to the castle and see!

<voice_0x01000F37><se_low>Yangus: Oops, I nearly forgot! The reason for all that malarkey was so we could get the magic mirror.
We better get on over to the castle, eh?

<voice_0x01000F38><se_def>Angelo: Where are you going?
We need to go to the castle, remember?
